department: Deparement of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: CANCELED solicitation for a SaaS Cloud Enterprise Learning Management System
description: This solicitation is for a SaaS Cloud Enterprise Learning Management System that can be configured to meet specific CSC requirements that allows for the management, delivery, tracking, reporting, and evaluation of all learning content and employee training.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: SaaS Cloud Enterprise Learning Management System (SCELMS)

#### Reference Number and Contact Information

* Reference Number: WS3768703611-Doc3779725255
* Solicitation Number: WS3768703611
* Published Date: January 18, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 27, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
	+ Contact: Karine Poulin (SPAC/PSPC, she/her), karine.poulin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* End User Entity: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
	+ Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON K1P 0P9, Canada

#### Tender Description and Requirements

The solicitation is for a Software as a Service (SaaS) Cloud Enterprise Learning Management System (SCELMS) that can be configured to meet specific requirements of the CSC. The ideal solution should provide management, delivery, tracking, reporting, and evaluation of all learning content and employee training.

#### Amendments and Cancellations

* Amendment 11: Modified closing time, please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
* Updated status: Cancelled

#### Procurement Information

* Procurement method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Category: SRV (Services)
* Trade Agreements: *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, NAFTA, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and more (refer to the trade agreements listing provided above)

#### Notice URL and Attachments

* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14837676?extsite=MTQ4Mzc2NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Attachments: None

#### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria for this tender will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Contact Information and URL

Please refer to the contact information above for further inquiries and questions. The solicitation can be found at the provided notice URL.
